title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Foundational Mathematics Skill Development with Immediate Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and comprehension of 7th-grade mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to apply basic mathematical concepts by achieving an 80% or higher correct answer rate on weekly e-assessments.
Learners improve their ability to derive correct answers within three retries during problem-solving processes using an immediate feedback system.

Learners can solve three real-world nursing tasks (e.g., patient monitoring, emergency response, medication error analysis) provided in a VR simulation environment using mathematical modeling (probability/statistics-based), complete one project portfolio including result reports and visualization materials, and meet at least four out of five evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
